feed.title: Why OpenTimestamps does not "linearize" its transactions

author.name: Undiscussed Horrific Abuse, One Victim of Many 2022-06-14 11:39:39

entry.title: Why OpenTimestamps does not "linearize" its transactions
entry.summary: The Opentimestamps ecosystem has been designed to be broken since its inception, according to a recent statement. However, the author suggests that instead of focusing on breaking the system, efforts should be directed towards normalizing or supporting better systems already in existence. Despite this suggestion, the author concedes that the Opentimestamps ecosystem is likely well-equipped to defend itself against any attempts to disrupt it.
